description: Patagonia's softest performance knit. Quick drying and wicking to keep you dry and comfortable, with HeiQ ® Fresh durable odor control. Made from 50% recycled content, Patagonia tech tees keep you comfortable when you’re working hard in conditions ranging from cool to hot. Fair Trade Certified ™ sewn.  The UPF range of 17–45 UPF - averaging 34 UPF. Even at 17 UPF, the products block 92% of the sun’s ultraviolet rays
name: Patagonia Capilene Cool Trail Tank - Mens
